classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
name: django-datetime-widget-fa
summary: Django-datetime-widget is a simple and clean widget for DateField, Timefiled and DateTimeField  in Django framework. It is based on Bootstrap datetime picker, supports both Bootstrap 3 and Bootstrap 2, and supports Font-Awesome. Special thanks to Alfredo Saglimbeni [https://github.com/asaglimbeni] for django-datetime-widget
